description:
Meet the compact light set designed to enhance your visibility as the day turns into night. The Hecto Drive 500XL delivers ample lumens and versatile modes to ensure you both see and are seen, while the Femto features a custom-engineered reflector providing over 270° of visibility. Embrace safety and style with this dynamic light duo, transforming your evening rides into a well-lit adventure.

  • Front light has 8 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 5 in flashing; steady: 500 lumens (1h), 200 lumens (2h), 100 lumens (4h), flash 1–50 lumens (13.5h), flash 2–15 lumens (20h), pulse flash 1–50 lumens (15h), and day flash–500 lumens (5.75h)
  • Rear light has 3 lighting modes, 1 in steady and 2 in flashing; steady: 5 lumens (4.30h), flash 1–5 lumens (15h), pulse flash 2-5 lumens (9h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Precisely tuned optics focus the power of each light’s LEDs to maximize visibility
  • Integrated USB plug on the front light means you don’t need to carry a charging cable – full charging takes ~3 hours
  • Micro USB (charging cable included) to charge the rear light – full charging takes ~3 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Hecto Drive 500XL / Femto USB Light Set
